name: A Message in the Groupchat
description: With this project, I'm trying to craft an engaging narrative where choices ultimately don't matter and the player always ends up back at the start . It opens with a friend messaging your character's groupchat and calling everyone out on their behavior over the last week, and telling them not to talk to her again. The player then goes through a series of events with the intent of going back in time and changing things--however, something always goes wrong and the text is always sent, bringing them back to the title screen.
